name: 葛瑞斐
objective:
本課程旨在引導學生熟悉詩歌、小說、及戲劇等文學作品之各種讀法。學生將於本課程裡研究諸如人物、主角、反派角色、場景、旁白、獨白、矛盾修辭法、誇張修辭法等文學及修辭術語。此外，學生亦將學習欣賞諸如明喻、暗喻、意象、象徵、符號等各種比喻的語文用法。藉此，學生將可提昇其對文學語言複雜特性的敏感度。　　　　

In this course we will discuss important concepts (key terms such as plot, character, setting) and techniques (useful strategies such as close reading) vital to the study of literature.  We will explore the many different kinds of questions we can ask about a literary text and which serve as the basis for conversing and writing about literature  We will also consider the crucial question of why we should study literature, what value and meaning literature may have for us in our lives.
